Summary Note:
Peters Vandenberghe Moens and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Brussels. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Peters Vandenberghe Moens is a seasoned professional with over 20 years of experience.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Peters Vandenberghe Moens is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Peters obtained his secondary school diploma from College Patroklia in 1999.
He then attended PXL University of Applied Sciences and Arts, which he graduated in 2004.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 20 years, Peters Vandenberghe Moens has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Peters Vandenberghe Moens began his professional journey as a Research Scientist at GSK Vaccines SA in 2005, laying the foundation for future success.
In 2008, he moved to Janssen Pharmaceutica NV to work as a Clinical Trials Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 310000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He has house located in Mechelen, worth 1740000 EUR.

He inherited 3960000 EUR from his father, a well-known Corporate Lawyer, in 2007, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Peters as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
